  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_80959</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_80959</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Un objet rond dans un mouvement circulaire</string>
            <string language="en">A round object in circular motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine runde Nachricht in der kreisförmigen 
Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um objeto redondo no movimento circular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un oggetto rotondo nel movimento circolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα στρογγυλό αντικείμενο στην κυκλική κίνηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un objeto redondo en el movimiento circular</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme illustre l'orbite en demi-cercle  d'un objet rond attaché à un fil se déplaçant en mouvement circulaire. La coupure du fil à X continue à faire bouger l'objet suivant un mouvement vers la gauche.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the half-circle orbit of a round object tied to a string moving in circular motion. Cutting the string at X keeps the object moving to the left direction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement circulaire</string>
            <string language="en">circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">direction</string>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement</string>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbite</string>
            <string language="en">Orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">objet rond</string>
            <string language="en">round object</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fil</string>
            <string language="en">string</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Halbkreisbahn
einer runden Nachricht, die an eine Zeichenkette gebunden wird, die in
kreisförmige Bewegung bewegt. Der Schnitt der Zeichenkette an X
hält die Nachricht, auf die linke Richtung zu bewegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a órbita do half-circle de
um objeto redondo amarrado a uma corda que move-se no movimento 
circular. Cortar a corda em X mantem o objeto mover-se para o 
sentido esquerdo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra l'orbita del half-circle 
di un oggetto rotondo legato ad una stringa che si muove nel movimento
circolare. Il taglio della stringa alla X mantiene l'oggetto 
muoversi verso il senso di sinistra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί την τροχιά μισό-κύκλων 
ενός στρογγυλού αντικειμένου που δένεται σε μια συμβολοσειρά που 
κινείται στην κυκλική κίνηση. Η κοπή της συμβολοσειράς στο 
Χ κρατά το αντικείμενο προς την αριστερή κατεύθυνση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra la órbita el en 
semi-círculo de un objeto redondo atado a una cadena que se mueve en 
el movimiento circular. Cortar la cadena en X guarda el objeto 
el moverse a la dirección izquierda.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreisförmige Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">runde Nachricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichenkette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento circular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sentido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órbita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατεύθυνση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετακίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
